alert.note: Alert for Northern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:28AM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern High Plains and Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult and may require tire chains for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Northern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
